<p class="title_light">Hello, I'm <b>Paulina Moskwa</b></p>

- I'm a machine learning engineer, writing in Python and C++.
- I studied Mathematical Engineering @ Politecnico di Milano, in my sunny Italy. Shortly after I moved to Tampere, in Finland, where for the first time in my life I experienced -25°C.
- I enjoy staying up-to-date with the [latest research papers]() and [experimenting]() with new models and frameworks whenever I can. In particular, I like to tease VLMs with optical illusions.
- Currently delving into parallel programming, specifically GPU & CUDA.
